Package controllers

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.Controller
      • controllers.AdminController

  • public class AdminController
extends Controller
    Controls the stage after the admin logs in stores admin's list of users in ObservableList to be displayed in the app serializes any changes to users after logging out or quitting

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AdminController​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void logout​()
      Takes user back to login screen, serializes admin object
      void newUser​(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      gets input from user as String from newUser TextField if newUser is not already taken, creates new user object and stores in list of users
      void quit​()
      exits app and serializes admin object
      void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, Admin admin)
      sets admin scene on primaryStage
